title: Introduction to Internet of Things (IoT)
introduction: The Internet of Things (IoT) is a network of interconnected devices that can communicate and exchange data over the internet without human intervention.
details: IoT devices can range from smart home appliances and wearables to industrial sensors and autonomous vehicles. The data collected by these devices can be used for analysis, automation, and decision-making. Learning about IoT involves understanding sensor technologies, communication protocols, and security challenges in IoT deployments.
